thread.title: Drake Bell Made The Best Drake & Josh Pun About Chrissy Teigen’s Fun Dip Fiasco
thread.title_full: Drake Bell Made The Best Drake & Josh Pun About Chrissy Teigen’s Fun Dip Fiasco

author: Stacey Grant
title: Drake Bell Made The Best Drake & Josh Pun About Chrissy Teigen’s Fun Dip Fiasco
text:
Stacey Grant Stacey_Grant91 1h ago 
Right before the Grammys , Chrissy Teigen suffered a serious ~fashion~ faux pas: She accidentally dyed her hand green after eating Fun Dip with her fingers. Thankfully, she didn't end up cosplaying as The Incredible Hulk at the award show, but her plea for help in un-dyeing her hand definitely did not go unnoticed. 
While fans started suggesting she dye her whole body green, à la Elphaba from Wicked , Drake Bell had a suggestion of his own — five days too late, might I add. The former Nickelodeon star was quick to make a Drake & Josh pun that's so spot on, I'm upset I didn't think of it first. 
On the Season 4 episode, "Mindy Loves Josh," Megan ( Miranda Cosgrove ) zaps Drake's hands and feet with some questionable chemical, dyeing his extremities a Hulkish green. To "fix it," he has to soak the affected areas in lizard urine. Naturally, fans were quick to continue the joke. 
At least Teigen will know what to do next time she loses a battle with Fun Dip.
